forum.content:
I've seen a lot things in that words can't expain
See we ain't any different but we just ain't the same
They never listen when we tell'em,tell'em
All they understand is venom,venom
People only use you when you let'em let'em
Well if that's the case then I'm the one to blame

這首歌聽到第一句就喜歡
"我見識過很多生命中無法解釋的事"

人活的越久 漸漸明白 有些事情
不需要去解釋
不用等時間說沖淡一切
就讓對方照自己的方式去想
可能是錯的 而且你不去解釋
我們這些懶得解釋的人少了那份
不再去追究的心態
I think I've thrown it all away
我們不再強烈表達
hear me out before you label me the bad one
任由那些思想 順著牽動他們的鼻子走
最懂得只有自己了
就算被傷害的是自己

I'm walking through the desert but I'm drowning inside
No river runs deeper than the tear from my eye
You only went and made me bitter
I wish I wasn't such a give
Apologise to my liver
Cause if that's the case then your the one to blame
forum.title: Good Intentions
